title: Seeking a skilled Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to support our fast-growing digital marketing efforts.
job_overview:
Seeking a skilled Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to support our fast-growing digital marketing efforts.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on experience

Role responsibilities:

Plan, execute, and analyze paid ad campaigns.

Optimize budgets for best results.

Work fully remote with flexible hours.

Requirements:

Minimum 1 year experience with Google/Facebook Ads.

Clear understanding of key digital marketing KPIs.
